general:
Hello, Joylanders!
This website is intended to share more about the story behind my bots, introduce them in greater detail, and more.
Well, we only have one bot for now, but I hope to eventually fill this entire site with more and more bots â€” and improve the interface, which is kind of average right now, hahahaha!
If you have any ideas for the site, feel free to share them with me.

I plan to fill this gray rectangle with lots of updates, news, and information about what I'm working on.
Version: 1.0.0
